content: Helo! I tries to tests gitlabAuth with zulip docker and selfHosted gitlab. After sign up on zulip.docker.local i allows gitlab.local to use my account and it redirects me back to zulip.docker.local/login start page. In var/zulip/auth.log "Tunnel connection failed: 407 Request rejected by proxy". nginx use zulip-enterprice conf, both sites with https. Can you please explain me whats is wrong?
reloop archer has marked this topic as resolved.
reloop archer has marked this topic as resolved.
reloop archer has marked this topic as unresolved.
This topic was moved here from #issues > gitlabauth by Alya Abbott.
Could outgoing htprequests that the Zulip server attempts to make be getting blocked by something in your configuration?
@reloop archer yeah, this definitely looks like some sort of networking issue.
hmmmmm, thinking i have to checking ngnix conf in gitlab instance

solved by adds /etc/supervisor/conf.d/zulip/smokescreen.conf

--allow-address gitlab.local.ip

Hope it will be usefull
